description: This file implements the CmaStats class, which appears to be used for tracking and managing statistics related to memory or resource allocation. It includes methods for inserting, copying, and deleting statistical data, as well as managing file and line number information associated with resource usage.

classes.name: CmaStats
classes.description: A class used for collecting and managing statistics related to resource or memory parts, including tracking collection counts, maximum differences, associated file and line info, and methods to manipulate these data.

methods.name: CmaStats::CmaStats
methods.description: Constructor initializing statistics with a size, file name, and line number, and inserting the size into the size tracking structure.

methods.name: CmaStats::~CmaStats
methods.description: Destructor freeing allocated file name memory.

methods.name: CmaStats::operator new
methods.description: Overloaded new operator to allocate memory via zmalloc.

methods.name: CmaStats::operator delete
methods.description: Overloaded delete operator to free memory via zfree.

methods.name: CmaStats::operator=
methods.description: Assignment operator copying file and line info, with proper memory management.

methods.name: CmaStats::Insert
methods.description: Inserts a resource size into the size collection.

methods.name: CmaStats::Insert
methods.description: Increases counts, sets file and line info if necessary, updates maxDiff, and inserts size into the size collection.

methods.name: bool Insert(unsigned int asize,char * file,int line)

ctags.name: CmaStats
ctags.pattern: /^CmaStats::CmaStats(unsigned int asize, char *_file, int _line) : count(1), cpcount(0), maxDiff(1/

ctags.name: Insert
ctags.pattern: /^bool CmaStats::Insert(unsigned int asize, char *file, int line)$/
